name: Welcome New Member
subject: Welcome to the GCC KEC!
body:
## Welcome to the Club!

Hi [Name],

We are so excited to have you join the General Coding Club at KEC.

Here are a few next steps:
* Join our [Discord Server](https://discord.gg/example)
* Follow us on [GitHub](https://github.com/gcc-kec)

We look forward to seeing you at our next event!

Best,
The GCC Team

name: Event Announcement
subject: [EVENT] Announcing: [Event Name]
body:
# You're Invited! üöÄ

Hi everyone,

We are thrilled to announce our next event: **[Event Name]**!

* **Date:** [Date]
* **Time:** [Time]
* **Location:** [Location/Link]

[Add a short description of the event here.]

[Register Here](https://forms.gle/example)

See you there!

name: Contest Reminder
subject: Reminder: [Contest Name] is Tomorrow!
body:
## Don't Forget! ‚è∞

Hi coders,

This is a quick reminder that our coding contest, **[Contest Name]**, is happening tomorrow, [Date] at [Time].

Be sure to [Register Here](https://forms.gle/example) if you haven't already.

Get ready to solve some problems!

Good luck,
The GCC Team

name: Project Showcase Call
subject: Showcase Your Project with GCC!
body:
## Built Something Cool?

Hi [Name],

We're looking for awesome projects built by our members to feature in our next **Member Showcase**!

If you have a project you'd like to share, please reply to this email with:
1.  Project Name
2.  A brief description
3.  Link to your GitHub repo
4.  (Optional) A live demo link

We can't wait to see what you've built!

Best,
The GCC Team
